      • BombPanel

        public BombPanel(int userWidth,
         int userHeight,
         int userNumBombs)
        Initializes panel to have userWidth and userHeight size with userNumBombs bombs
        Parameters:
        userWidth - number of tiles in the "x" direction, must be >0 and <100
        userHeight - number of tiles in the "y" direction, must be >0 and <100
        userNumBombs - number of bombs to place on the map, must be >0 and
        See Also:
        BombPanel
